articles.description: THE QUEEN has narrowly avoided being plunged into the highest level of coronavirus restrictions.

articles.title: More than 30 travel fines issued in week under Covid rules - STV News
articles.description: The force served 33 fixed penalty notices across eight of its divisions in the week running up to November 25.
